content.question: The relationship between the United States and the Soviet Union outlined in the excerpt most immediately resulted in which of the following actions by the United States?

choices.label: The development of more powerful conventional and nuclear weapons
The establishment of diplomatic relations with the People’s Republic of China
The efforts to overthrow the revolutionary communist government in Cuba
The fostering of détente with the Soviet Union

content.answer: The development of more powerful conventional and nuclear weapons

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
